resources.string: Allow localization to determine your neighbourhood automatically
Cannot obtain your GPS coordinates. Did you enable Localisation on your phone?
Impossible to localize you. Is your location on?
Zone outside of Montreal/Not yet supported

Do you have any items you want to get rid off without harming the environment? Montreal has 7 eco-centers that accept items that are a health hazard or harmful to the environment such as construction waste, metal, electronic devices, clothing and reusable items. \"
Choose your neighbourhood so that we can tell you the day of the collections. It is also possible to let us locate you.

Trashy is an app that will ease your life.
 Do you constantly forget on which days you should take out your trash, recycling bags or compost? Trashy is here to help.
 Connected to the city's schedules, Trashy will inform you, depending on your location , on which days you should take out your wastes.
 
 Are you willing to be even more eco-friendly? Let us tell you the closest eco-centers
 where you can bring different types of waste (such as batteries, metal, old clothes) in order to reuse it, or simply throw it away carefully.

 Plus, all of the information you need is carefully registered in your calendaer. Have a look.
Choose your neighbourhood so that the schedule adapts to it.
